TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LocationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the location mode to indicate which location should receive the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.LocationMode PrimaryOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Requests are always sent to the primary location.
Docs.remarks: If this value is used for requests that only work against a secondary location (GetServiceStats, for example), the request will fail in the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.LocationMode PrimaryThenSecondary = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Requests are always sent to the primary location first. If a request fails, it is sent to the secondary location.
Docs.remarks: If this value is used for requests that are only valid against one location, the client will only target the allowed location.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.LocationMode SecondaryOnly = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Requests are always sent to the secondary location.
Docs.remarks: If this value is used for requests that only work against a primary location (create, modify, and delete APIs), the request will fail in the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.LocationMode SecondaryThenPrimary = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Requests are always sent to the secondary location first. If a request fails, it is sent to the primary location.
Docs.remarks: If this value is used for requests that are only valid against one location, the client will only target the allowed location.
